00019 #include <qtable.h>
00020 #include <qlineedit.h>
00021 #include <qwidget.h>
00022 #include <qdatetime.h>
00023 
00024 #include "journalEditDate.h"
00025 
00026 JournalEditDate::JournalEditDate(QTable *table, const QDate newDate)
00027     : QTableItem(table, QTableItem::OnTyping), recordDate(newDate)
00028 {
00029     if(recordDate.isValid())
00030         setText(recordDate.toString());
00031 }
00032 
00033 QWidget* JournalEditDate::createEditor() const
00034 {
00035     QLineEdit *lineEdit = new QLineEdit(table()->viewport());
00036     lineEdit->setInputMask("99/99/99");
00037     lineEdit->setText(text());
00038     lineEdit->selectAll();
00039     return lineEdit;
00040 }
00041 
00042 QString JournalEditDate::text() const
00043 {
00044     if(recordDate.isValid())
00045         return recordDate.toString("MM/dd/yy");
00046     else
00047         return QString::null;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void JournalEditDate::setContentFromEditor(QWidget *widget)
00051 {
00052     QString content = ((QLineEdit*)(widget))->text();
00053     QString month = content.left(2);
00054     QString day = content.mid(3, 2);
00055     QString year = content.right(2);
00056 
00057     if(year.toInt() > (QDate::currentDate().year() + 5))
00058         recordDate.setYMD(year.toInt() + 1900, month.toInt(), day.toInt());
00059     else
00060         recordDate.setYMD(year.toInt() + 2000, month.toInt(), day.toInt());
00061 }
00062 
00063 QDate JournalEditDate::date() const
00064 {
00065     return recordDate;
00066 }
